name: Train Runner VR™
detailed_description:
Train Runner VR 1.0 and Beyond

Version 1.0 of Train Runner VR is just the beginning. We’d like to thank you for your all your ideas and feedback that will help make our game even better! While there is only one level of gameplay in our first release, we have found that the kids who have playtested TR find the story fun and the action exciting. We intend to continually add features to TR by adding new scenes, gadgets or story lines. All updates are free both now and in the future.

Again, we'd like to thank the Steam community as well as the many online reviewers who have taken the time to tell us their thoughts about our game and provide us with valuable feedback. Thanks for helping us make our products better!


About the Game

Train Runner VR™ is an original, family-friendly game that immerses you in a magical world where you become the hero who bravely rescues the lovable puppy, Panda. It will take cleverness, nerves of steel and all the courage you can muster to save Panda and return him back to Kaley, his owner. The objective of Train Runner is to rescue Panda by defeating the train with a medieval bow and a flaming arrow and a ballista that launches a variety of explosive projectiles such as flaming cannonballs! After the train is finally defeated, you can explore the amazing world of Train Runner and all the surprises and wonder that it has to offer.

Have fun by discovering the surprises that await you in Train Runner's Mystery Box!


“So if you or your kids are looking for an adorable but exciting experience then you should check this one out.”


"If you're weary of action-heavy virtual reality games, or goofy and over-the-top experiences, then we have something rather refreshing as Rocket Entertainment, an all-new player in the rising VR space, is releasing its debut all-ages game Train Runner VR."

Train Runner VR will give you hours of entertainment value and fun! Discover new ways to rescue Panda and enjoy new original musical scores written specifically for Train Runner. If you have any questions or issues with playing Train Runner, please contact us. We've got you covered!

Key Features

  • Be a hero and rescue Panda from railroad tracks that cross a 500-foot bridge!
  • Kid-friendly entertainment the whole family will enjoy.
  • Defeat the train by using the Bow and Arrow and Ballista that can be found on the platforms near the tracks.
  • See what’s in the Mystery Box!
  • Game Tutorial and Help available in 6 languages (English, French, Italian, German, Spanish and Japanese).
  • Destroy all the cars, including the locomotive and coal car and see what happens!
  • After you save Panda, explore the amazing world of Train Runner. Walk down the tracks, discover the cave up the hill, or fire your ballista at the barrels of TNT!

A VR-only game!
Current version of game has only 1 level. Exciting new levels of game play and features available at no additional charge in 1H 2018.

short_description: Train Runner VR™ is a highly immersive VR game that will have you running for your life as you try to rescue Panda, a stranded puppy, from a runaway train. Train Runner VR is exhilarating, heart-pounding entertainment for kids and a game the whole family can enjoy.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
